title: Microsoft Windows XP Professional Corporate Edition RTM SP0 2001
description:
*.*.* this is my first "release/upload", and it&#039;s not even by myself ;) *.*.*

M!cr050ft windows xp professional corporate edition rtm x32 untouched and pure, english, no sp integrated

features of this torrent:
- standard uncompressed .iso-file (no .uif-.ccd-.nrg or other bullsh__ format)
- MD5-checksum: 5db1a137ba7bc8b561a1dd120f5c7d8d

(md5 checksum created with rapidcrc 0.6.1; use a checksum tool like rapidcrc if you want to verify file integrity by yourself; http://rapidcrc.sourceforge.net/)

- emule-v0.48a-file-id: 8386544E7BFFC3D2F252E9F6C96AFCC1
- file size is 488 MB (512.342.016 bytes)
- iso-file is not password protected, in fact: no passwords needed for anything at all
- iso-label: "WXPVOL_EN"
- all extracted files from the iso and the iso-file itself were scanned for viruses; result: no virus, no trojan, no worm, no spyware, no malware inside the iso and among the extracted files.

(scanned with "Kaspersky Anti-Virus 7.0" using the latest virus-definitions available at the time of release; additionally scanned with "Avira AntiVir PersonalEdition Classic" also using the latest virus-definitions available at the time of publishing; both scans were done using the highest detection levels an most intensive scan-methods)

- this is a clean, original, unmodified version of microsoft windows xp professional corporate edition
- no retail / no oem version
- it&#039;s a corporate edition; it *could* work with a volume license key if you have your own legal product key! ("VLK")
- genuine windows, if you have you own legit VLK it passes all WGA checks (don&#039;t use illegal keys! they will be blacklisted be micro$oft anyway and wpa will not work! buy your own legit key from microsoft!)
- no stupid microsoft product activation or 30 day-trial-period --> not necessary because it&#039;s corporate and the activation-thing was removed by microsoft
- it&#039;s in english language
- it is the 32bit edition, not the x64 version!
- build: 5.1.2600.0 (Gold)
- the iso can be burned to a real (empty) cd-rom using a burn program like nero or alcohol 120%
- the iso/cd-rom is bootable, although you might want to simulate the entire setup procedure with VMWare or M$ VirtualPC
- it&#039;s completely updateable
- no files were deleted, no modifications made, not "nlited", it&#039;s pure like a virgin ;)
- no cracks, no hacks, no modifications on sfc/wfp
- no brandings, no wallpapers, etc
- ideal for slipstreaming upcoming sp3 (slipstreaming from rtm/sp0 directly to sp3 is recommended; slipstreaming from wxpsp1/sp22 to sp3 leaves unnecessary files on the iso, thus wasting valuable space on the iso!)
- no "optimized" version, eg: "gamers edition", "power edition" or similar crap
- no missing or courrupted files during setup-procedure, i encountered no errors at all
- no winnt.sif, no unattended setup, no $OEM$-dir, no WIN51IP.SP[x]-file in root dir
- **NO SERVICE PACK INCLUDED**: no sp1, no sp1a (build 5.1.2600.1106), no sp2 (build 5.1.2600.2180), no sp3 (i don&#039;t know yet the final build number of sp3); sp-level is "sp0" (build 5.1.2600.0)
- on general-tab of system properties window it says: "Microsoft Windows Xp; Professional; Version 2002; [no ServicePack-information given]"

--> this is the first version of winxp released on october 25, 2001; with absolutely no microsoft updates, patches, hotfixes or servicepacks (so it&#039;s buggy and vulnerable like hell! please integrate sp3 if you want to use it in a productive environment!)

### YOU NEED YOUR OWN CD-KEY ###
no product-key is included or slipstreamed. get your own legit VLK key from microsoft!!!
these are just the original setup-files. this OS cannot be installed without a legal product key and therefore is useless without key: get your own legal license from microsoft!

- you can use this version to create your own xp-modifications, find bugs, search for security holes, or whatever you want to do...
- upcomming sp3 rtm can easily be slipstreamed into the setup-cd; try AutoStreamer (goolgle for "AutoStreamer") or use nlite (http://www.nliteos.com/).

disclaimer:
i am not the author of this iso-file. i did not made the cd-image of my own. i am 99% sure that this is an untouched winxp-version, but since i did it not by myself i cannot give you a 100%-guarantee.
i was searching for a clean and untouched wxp-setup-cd for a long time and finally found one at sumotorrents. so i downloaded it, (virus-) checked it, verified the iso-content, tested everything with a virtual machine (VMWare and M$ VirtualPC), compared file versions and checksums with information available online and finally (re-)upload it for all those of you who want no premodified xp-bullsh__ by third parties. so no thanks to me, thanks to the original uploader!

============== <a href="
http://www.sumotorrent.com/en/details/978052/Windows%20XP%20Professional%20Corporate%20Edition.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.sumotorrent.com/en/details/978052/Windows%20XP%20Professional%20Corporate%20Edition.html</a>

quote: "This is an original Windows XP Professional Corporate Edition bootable install disc. It&#039;s not much on its own, but it is useful if you want a clean disc to start creating your own XP mods."
==============

if you are looking for an easy n00b-pr00f setup with lots of toys and integrated stuff: this is not what you want!


last but not least i want to encourage everyone of you who wants to download this torrent to seed this torrent for a while. you are downloading / finished downloading this file because some people provided it to you. so please: SEED! it costs no great effort and gives something back to our peer2peer-community :)


what can you do?
1. write comments
2. scan for viruses yourself to verify my statements above and give feedbacks
3. report bugs or errors during setup (if any occur at all)
